name: The Festival
description:
A Visual Novel based on Yugioh with Ryou Bakura as the protagonist. The story is set on an alternate universe where he will have to face the challenge of participating in a school festival and deal with his two problematic classmates TK and Yami.

This game contains boys love! (Gemshipping, tendershipping) but it's PG.

The character art is rough and there is no sound or music.

Features two pairings and six different endings.
